Casinoways Trustpilot FAQ.text: Is account verification mandatory at Casinoways?
Yes, identity verification is required before the first withdrawal to meet regulatory and anti-fraud standards.
What is the maximum withdrawal limit per transaction?
The maximum withdrawal per transaction is £5,000, depending on the selected payment method.
Are there wagering requirements on cashback rewards?
No, cashback rewards credited through promotions are usually wager-free unless otherwise specified.
Can I close my Casinoways account temporarily?
Yes, players can request a temporary suspension or self-exclusion through the responsible gaming settings or by contacting support.
Is there a VIP or loyalty program at Casinoways?
Yes, Casinoways has a tiered loyalty program where users earn points and unlock rewards based on gameplay activity.
Does Casinoways offer tournaments or slot races?
Yes, regular slot tournaments and prize drops are available with real-time leaderboards and prize pools.
Are there any fees for currency conversion?
Yes, currency conversion fees may apply if you deposit or withdraw in a currency different from your account setting.
What age do I need to be to play at Casinoways?
Players must be at least 18 years old or the legal age in their jurisdiction, whichever is higher.
Can I use multiple payment methods on my account?
Yes, multiple methods can be added, but the casino may require withdrawals to match the deposit method.
Does Casinoways accept prepaid cards?
Yes, certain prepaid cards like Paysafecard are accepted for deposits, but not for withdrawals.
